messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is the only known written transcriptions of this hideous spell?
The Book of Eibon and the Revelations of Gla'aki.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost of the Implant Fear spell in Sanity points?
0/1D6 Sanity points.
You are a helpful assistant.
How many rounds does the Flesh Ward spell take to cast?
5 rounds.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost of the Implant Fear spell in magic points?
12 magic points.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the only known written transcription of the 'Creeping Mold' spell?
The Book of Eibon and the Revelations of Gla'aki.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost of the 'Flesh Ward' spell in terms of magic points?
Variable magic points.
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does the protection from the 'Flesh Ward' spell last?
24 hours or until the protection is used up.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of the 'Creeping Mold' spell on the target's Sanity points?
0/1D6 Sanity points.
You are a helpful assistant.
How long does the Flesh Ward spell last?
24 hours or until the protection is used up.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an alternative name for the Flesh Ward spell?
Protect Thee from Mighty Blows, Armour of the Will, Blood Shield.
You are a helpful assistant.
How much damage is taken when Flesh Ward reduces its armor to 0 points?
No damage.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost of casting Flesh Ward on dead flesh in terms of magic points and sanity points?
1 magic point per 15 SIZ of dead flesh; 1D4 Sanity points.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of the spell on human flesh?
The victim's flesh is melted causing horrific disfigurement
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost to the caster when using the spell on animate flesh?
The cost is substantially higher to the caster in magic points
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect on the victim if the face is targeted?
The victim may become blind or lose the ability to hear
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the cost in Sanity points when the spell is used on human flesh?
Seeing human flesh melt off human bones costs 1/1D6 Sanity points
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the damage dealt to the victim's flesh?
1D4 damage per 15 SIZ points affected
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the face is targeted in the Liquefy Skin spell?
The victim may become blind or lose the ability to hear, and possibly suffocate unless air vents can be quickly created.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is affected by the spell?
A single target, who is visible to the unaided eye
You are a helpful assistant.
What entities are affected by the spell?
Lengites, deep one hybrids, ghoul changelings, Little People, serpent folk and deep ones who have interbred with humans
You are a helpful assistant.
What is required for the spell to take effect?
The caster must succeed in an opposed POW roll with the target
You are a helpful assistant.
What additional roll is required for extreme suggestions?
A second opposed POW roll just before the suggestion is implemented
